name: Hoth Blockade
Lore: '''Make ready to land our troops beyond their energy field and deploy the fleet so that nothing gets off the system.''',
Text: 'Deploy on Hoth. Haven here is suspended. Executor is deploy -4 here (to a maximum of -6). For each marker site you control with an AT-AT and an Imperial, your total power here is +1. If opponent controls Hoth, place this Effect in Used Pile. (Immune to Alter.)',
